## Workspace.on() method

Triggered when the user opens the context menu on an editor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
on(name: 'editor-menu', callback: (menu: Menu, editor: Editor, info: MarkdownView | MarkdownFileInfo) => any, ctx?: any): EventRef;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | 'editor-menu' |  |
|  callback | (menu: [Menu](./obsidian.menu.md)<!-- -->, editor: [Editor](./obsidian.editor.md)<!-- -->, info: [MarkdownView](./obsidian.markdownview.md) \| [MarkdownFileInfo](./obsidian.markdownfileinfo.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; any |  |
|  ctx | any | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[EventRef](./obsidian.eventref.md)
